GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v5.15.82
GSD.description:
hwmon: (coretemp) Check for null before removing sysfs attrs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.82 by commit 7692700ac818866d138a8de555130a6e70e6ac16, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 199e0de7f5df31a4fc485d4aaaf8a07718252ace. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: hwmon: (coretemp) Check for null before removing sysfs attrs
